entry.title: Open Design Engine - Support #131: No Notification of Comments on News Items
entry.content:
• Priority changed from Low to Normal
  • Target version set to v0.3 - Sustainability Enhancements

Note, we should investigate this behavior in the latest Redmine release to see if it is something that will be addresses by the next update from their trunk.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Support #131: No Notification of Comments on News Items
entry.content: Is Chris' update of ODE to the latest version of Redmine to the point where we could test this?
